Salmon, a former Democrat turned Republican, told POLITICO that first-term independent Sen. Bernie Sanders is`` closer to meeting a challenge'' and that he's undeterred by the long odds of a successful bid. Right now, I am 65 percent in. When I hit 75 percent it will commence exploratory. I plan to continue to listen to diverse groups, reflect, and ensure it is the right thing to do for self, family, state and country, said Salmon.`` I am not attached to the 2012 outcome, my odds, or my political career. high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget.`` That's when you get the goose bumps,'' Allen Iverson said. You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there. The Philadelphia star scored 60 points, a career high and the most in the NBA this season, to lead the 76ers to a 112-99 victory over the Orlando Magic Johnson on Saturday night.
